column1: A funeral mass will be held at 10:00 AM on Friday
column3: 2015 at St. Edward Catholic Church in Chillicothe. Friends and family are invited to a visitation the night before on Thursday
column5: 2015 at Weber-Hurd Funeral Home in Chillicothe from 5:00-7:00 PM. A Rosary will be held for Bernadine following the visitation. Burial will be at Wyoming Cemetery
column6: following the funeral mass. Fr. Keith Walder will officiate.
